summary_markdown: This table outlines key objectives related to advertising and public relations within a promotion mix framework. Objective 15-1 focuses on defining the fundamental role of advertising, referencing its definition on page 452. Objective 15-2 delves into the major decisions required for developing an advertising program, with detailed coverage from pages 453 to 470. Shifting to public relations, Objective 15-3 aims to define its role within the promotion mix, with related content on pages 470 to 472. Finally, Objective 15-4 explains how companies utilize public relations to engage with their target audiences, referencing major public relations tools on page 472. The structure is hierarchical, moving from defining the roles of advertising and public relations to detailing the decision-making processes and tools associated with each.
